channel.title: Blog on Manish Tiwari
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Manish Tiwari - ML, Data Science, and Open Source

item.title: Beyond the Scorecard: Decoding Team Strategies in IPL 2025 Using Data Science
item.description: An analytical deep dive into IPL 2025 using data science techniques to uncover team strategies, player performance patterns, and predictive insights beyond traditional cricket statistics.

item.title: From Raw Data to Actionable Insights: My 3-Day Deep Dive into Data Science Salaries
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of data science salary trends across industries, experience levels, and geographic locations based on real-world data, providing actionable career insights for aspiring data scientists.
